maqras.text: Kiya hum nay tera seena nahi khol diya
Aur tujh per say tera bojh hum ney utar diya
Jiss nay teri peth tordi thi
Aur hum nay tera zikar buland kerdiya
Pus yaqenan mushkil kay sath asani hai
By-shak mushkil kay sath asani hai
Pus jab to farigh ho to ibadat mein mehnat ker
Aur apney parwardigar hi ki tareef mein dil laga
Qasm hai enjeer ki aur zetoon ki
Aur toor seeneen ki
Aur iss aman walay sher ki
Yaqenan hum nay insan ko behtren soorat mein paida kia
Phir isssay neechon say necha kerdiye
lekin jo log eman laey aur (phir)nek amal kiey to inkay liey aisa ajar hai jo kabhi khatam na hoga
Pus tujhay abb roz jaza kay jhutlanay per konsi cheez amaadah kerti hai
Kiya Allah Taalaa (sabb) haakemon ka hakim nahi hai
Parh apnay rab kay naam say jiss nay peda kiya
Jiss nay insan ko khoon kay lothray say peda kiya
tu parhta reh tera rab baray karam wala hai
Jiss nay qalam kay zariye(ilm)sikhaya
Jiss nay insan ko who sikhaya jissay who nai janta tha
Such much insan to apnay say bahir hojata hy
isliey kay who apnay apko beparwah(ya tu nagar)samjhta hy hai
Yaqeenan lotna teray rab ki taraf hai
(Bhala)issay bhi tumnay dekha jo bandy ko rokta hai
Jabkay who banda salat ada kerta hai
Bahala batla to ager who hidayat per ho
Ya parhezgari ka hokum deta ho
Bhala dekho to agar yeh jhutlata ho aur mun perhta ho to
Kiya uss nay nahi jana kay Allah Taalaa ussay khob dekh raha hai
Yaqeenan ager yeh baaz na raha to hum iski peshani kay baal paker ker ghaseetein gay
Aisi peshani jo jhooti katakar hai
yeh apni majlis walon ko bulalay
hum bhi (dozakh kay)piyadon ko bula lein gy
Khabardar! isska kehna hergiz na manna aur sajda ker aur qareeb hoja
Yaqeenan hum nay issay shab qadar mein nazil farmaya
To kiaya janey kay shab qadar kiya hy
Shab qadar aik hazar maheeno say behter hai
Iss (mein her kaam) kay siranjam denay ko apney rab kay hukum say farishty aur rooh(jibrael)utertay hain
Yeh raat sir-a-sir slamti ki hoti hai aur fajar kay tuloo honay tak(rehti hai)
Ehl-e-kitab kay kafir aur mushrik log jabb tak kay unkay pass zahir daleel na ajaye baz rehnay waly na thay(who daleel yeh thi kay)
Allah Taalaa ka aik rasol jo pak saheefay parhay
jin mein sahi aur durust ehkam hon
Ehl-e-kitab apnay pass zahir daleel ajanay kay baad hi (ikhtilaaf mein par ker) mutafarriq hogaey

Unhein isskay siwa koi hokum nahi diya gaya kay sirf Allah ki ibadat kerein ussi kay liey deen ko khalis rakhein.ibraheem hanif kay deen per aur salat ko qaem rakhein aur zakat dety rahen yehi hai deen sedhi millat ka
Be-shak jo log ehl-e-kitab mein say kafir huye aur mushrikeen sab dozakh ki aag mein(jaeigy)jahan who hamesha(hamesha)reheingy.yeh log bad tareen khalaeeq hain
Be-shak jo log eman laey aur nek amal kiey yeh log behtreen khalaeeq hain

Inn ka badla unkay rab kay pass hameshgi wohi jannaten hein jinkay neechy nehrein beh rahi hein jin mein who hamesha hamesha rahein gay.Allah Taalaa unsy razi hua aur yeh uss say razi huye.yeh hai uskay liey jo apnay perwardigar say daray
Jabb zameen pori tarah jhanjor di jaeygi
Aur apney bojh bahar nikal phenkay gi
Insan kehnay lagay ga kay issay kiya hogaya
Uss din zameen apni sabb khabrein biyan kerdegi
Issliye kay tery rab nay ussy hukam diya hoga
Uss rozlog mukhtalif jamatein hoker(wapis)lotein gay takey unhein unkay aiymaal dikha diey jaein
pus jiss nay zara baraber neki ki hogi who issay dekhlega
Aur jiss nay zara baraber burai ki hogi who ussy dekhlega
Hanpety hoye dorney waly ghoron ki qasam
Phir taap maar ker aag jharnay walon ki qasam
Phir subha kay waqat dhawa bolney walon ki qasam
Pus uss waqat gard-o-ghubar uraty hein
Phir ussi kay sath fojon kay darmiyan ghos jaty hein
Yaqeenan insan apnay rab ka bara nashukra hy
Aur yaqeenan who khud bhi issi per gawah hai
Yeh maal ki muhabbat mein bhi bara sakht hai
